name: Far de Tossa
excerpt: Mont Guardí is crowned by this 1917 lighthouse, which contains walk-through displays on the history of lighthouses. At the time of writing, it was closed…
detail_description: Mont Guardí is crowned by this 1917 lighthouse, which contains walk-through displays on the history of lighthouses. At the time of writing, it was closed for refurbishment works. Concerts are held in the glow of the lighthouse in July and August (additional charges apply).

name: Museu Municipal
excerpt: Set within a 14th-century mansion in the lower part of Tossa's Vila Vella, this small museum displays mosaics and other finds from a local Roman villa …
detail_description: Set within a 14th-century mansion in the lower part of Tossa's Vila Vella, this small museum displays mosaics and other finds from a local Roman villa (off Avinguda del Pelegrí) plus Tossa-related art, including Marc Chagall’s Celestial Violinist.
